page.title: 16News
page.content: {Mains Electricity on the "Off Islands" The Isles of Scilly are getting mains electricity now because it is expensive and inconvenient to produce electricity with home generators. There are four boats to do with the cable laying .There is the{Gardiance for laying the cable.The{Jubilance }is for carrying cargo from the mainland to St.Mary's. There are{Crazy Diamond and{Scavenger}too. They bring the cable ashore by pulling it up with air bags tied to it and then they put concrete bags on top of the cable so that the boats' anchors will not get hooked on it. Between Bryher and Tresco the cable is being laid next to the telephone cable and most of the other cables are being laid in the same way. All the power will come from the power station on St. Mary's.
